text: Mor'du or not, I'll avenge your mother!
title: Brave

text: - I'll not risk losing you, too.- No, Dad! Just listen to me.
title: Brave

text: - It's your wife Elinor!- Maudie, keep this and don't let her out.
title: Brave

text: - What about the bear?- Just stay put.
title: Brave

text: Come on, you sorry bunch of galoots!
title: Brave

text: Needle and thread. Needle and thread.Needle and thread.
title: Brave

text: Needle and thread. Needle and thread.Needle and thread.
title: Brave

text: Watch your blade! You're goingto take somebody's arm off!
title: Brave

text: - Give me a hand over here!- Put your back into it, Dingwall!
title: Brave

text: I'm doing all the pulling here.
title: Brave

text: - Get back. That's my mother.- Are you out of your mind, lass?
title: Brave

text: I'll not let you kill my mother.
title: Brave

text: Come on! I'll take youwith my bare hands!
title: Brave

text: You've always been there for me.
title: Brave

text: You've never given up on me.
title: Brave

text: You're back. She came back to us.
title: Brave

text: It's a great day for this kingdom.The curse is broke.
title: Brave

text: Don't just stare at me. Do something!
title: Brave

text: What the... Avert your eyes, lads!
title: Brave

text: Now that's what I calla wee naked babby!
title: Brave

text: We've got to wave them off!Come along!
title: Brave

text: Goodbye! All the best!Fair wind to your sails!
title: Brave

text: There are those who say fate issomething beyond our command,
title: Brave

text: that destiny is not our own.
title: Brave

text: You only have to bebrave enough to see it.
title: Brave

text: Come on, birdbrain. Ihaven't got all day.
title: Brave
